explains: adj. 受到赞扬的；备受推崇的；广受欢迎的
v. 称赞，推崇（acclaim 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: He was acclaimed as America's greatest filmmaker.
sentences.cn: 他被赞誉为美国最伟大的电影制片人。

sentences.en: They acclaimed him as the best writer of the year.
sentences.cn: 他们称赞他为当年的最佳作者。

sentences.en: The work was acclaimed as a masterpiece.
